snippet.title: Descent of Dragons Announcement Trailer | Hearthstone
snippet.description:
Join Hearthstone Developer Alec Dawson as he gives us a dragon’s eye view of the last chapter in our year-long narrative – Descent of Dragons! The battle lines are drawn and the fate of the world is in your hands. Who will win in this epic battle of good vs E.V.I.L.? You decide! 

Descent of Dragons will take off on December 10 with 135 new cards to add to your collection, including new Galakrond Hero Cards, Sidequests, a new Invoke keyword, and tons of dragons!

Pre-purchase Descent of Dragons and be prepared to take to the skies when Descent of Dragons launches later this year. Two pre-purchase options are available, and you can get BOTH for extra value! 

Learn more at http://www.DescentOfDragons.com

LEARN MORE about Hearthstone: https://playhearthstone.com
SUBSCRIBE to follow Hearthstone: http://blizz.ly/Subscribe
Hearthstone is Blizzard Entertainment’s highly acclaimed digital strategy card game that’s easy to learn and massively fun. Start playing for free and wield your cards to sling spells, summon creatures, and command the heroes of Warcraft in duels of epic strategy.
